Class NetCodecs

com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.NetCodecs
public final class NetCodecs extends Object
NetBuf Codec utilities.

    • SIGNED_VAR_INT

      public static final net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<NetByteBuf,Integer> SIGNED_VAR_INT
      Version of ByteBufCodecs.VAR_INT that handles negative integers properly.

      Use ByteBufCodecs.VAR_INT for unsigned integers.

    • SIGNED_VAR_LONG

      public static final net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<NetByteBuf,Long> SIGNED_VAR_LONG
      Version of ByteBufCodecs.VAR_LONG that handles negative longs properly.

      Use ByteBufCodecs.VAR_LONG for unsigned longs.

  • Method Details

    • buffer

      public static <B extends io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf> net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf,B> buffer(IntFunction<B> bufferCtor)
      Creates a codec for a byte buffer.
      Type Parameters:
      B - the type of byte buffer this codec will be for.
      Parameters:
      bufferCtor - constructs the result buffer when given a buffer length.
      Returns:
      a codec for the specified type of byte buffer.

    • buffer

      public static <V extends io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf, B extends io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf> net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<B,V> buffer(DerivativeBufferSupplier<B,V> bufferCtor)
      Creates a codec for a byte buffer that takes context from the buffer being read.

      This is intended for reading a registry buffer from another registry buffer.

      Note: Do not read from the original buffer when constructing the new buffer, as that would cause reads and writes to become unbalanced.

      Type Parameters:
      V - the type of byte buffer this codec will be for.
      B - the type of byte buffer this codec read/writes to.
      Parameters:
      bufferCtor - constructs the result buffer when given the original buffer for context and a buffer length.
      Returns:
      a codec for the specified type of byte buffer.

      E - the type of enum.
      Parameters:
      enumClass - the class of the enum.
      Returns:
      a StreamCodec for reading/writing the specified

    • fixedBits

      public static net.minecraft.network.codec.StreamCodec<NetByteBuf,Integer> fixedBits(int length)
      Packet codec for reading/writing a fixed number of bits.
      Parameters:
      length - the number of bits to write.
      Returns:
      a StreamCodec for reading/writing the specified number of bits.
